summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the EventBridge integration layer, covering model serialization, AWS API operations, CloudFormation custom resources, HTTP target handling, and multiple integration scenarios such as event bus forwarding, Lambda triggers, partner event buses, archives, rules, permissions, tagging, and event publishing, all using Moto to mock AWS services.
business_intent: Ensure reliable and correct behavior of all EventBridge-related functionalities in the codebase across a wide range of use cases and edge cases, providing confidence in event routing, resource lifecycle management, and external service integrations.
